item.title: CRLF at end of line in diff
item.description: It is nasty to see ^M at end of each line, especially when they are in color. Here is the solution. $ git config --global core.whitespace cr-at-eol you don’t need -w or --ignore-cr-at-eol if you just don’t want let them visible and don’t care the difference.
